description: Stepdad Jimmy Broadway was just coming in Dolly Leigh's room to ask her what she wants for dinner, and is surprised when she asks him if she's pretty, and if boys would want to fuck her. And even more surprised, when she asks if he wants to fuck her. Well, yes, but she's his stepdaughter - but you know, men are weak. Daddy enjoys fucking sweet Dolly and having her suck his dick like a champ. But then she has another surprise for him. Seems her phone has been on video record, and now there's documentation of their encounter. Dolly's mood changes from adorable to bratty and dominant as she gleefully announces that she's going to show the video to Mom if he doesn't do everything she says, she's the boss now. Dolly makes him worship her feet and crawl on all fours, and then she has yet another surprise -- a pretty pink and purple strap-on. But if stepdad Jimmy thinks the humiliation is going to end there, well, no. As a grand finale, Dolly pegs Jimmy but good in several positions, and leaves him with the humiliating knowledge that he'll always be under his stepdaughter's thumb.
title: Stepdad gets Fucked
